description: Värmland Wool Jacket is a warm, protective and quiet hunting jacket made in a fantastic fabric of recycled wool combined with G-1000 Silent Eco. Perfect for passive hunting with active periods, thanks to the wool's temperature-regulating properties. The hood can be detached when it isn’t being used. Several spacious pockets including wool-lined hand warming pockets at chest height. A durable, sustainable hunting garment for the highest level of comfort on cold autumn days.
name: Fjallraven Varmland Wool Jacket - Mens
